nodes.bodyText: This change is no-op @gustavonalle . Are you sure you actually wrote what you intended?
This will reproduce the failure much easier, as there is only a small probability that the first indexer will not be executed
Why not catch Throwable ? I have strange gut feelings for Error

From the Error javadoc:  "An Error is a subclass of Throwable that indicates serious problems that a reasonable application should not try to catch."  But tests are usually unreasonable applications because they are supposed to break and burn. :)
